## dataGridRowTemplate variable

Generates a template for the [DataGridRow](./fast-foundation.datagridrow.md) component using the provided prefix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataGridRowTemplate: FoundationElementTemplate<ViewTemplate<DataGridRow>>
```
